title: 7.1 patch big problem for MacBook users
body:
before this patch i had no problems and my ping was like 30 or 35 max .. after the patch i can not play anymore .. i start the game and my ping go high like from 35 to 300--500 and then go down every minute .. the problem is not from my internet connection, the problem is only on the MacBook cause i tried to play on my friend laptop and he had no problem, he have normal laptop like Samsung .. i tried to contact Riot point and they just give me some r%%%%%ed response that is never going to work. other Mac users having other problems like freezing or something like that .. 
we need a solution from Riot point !
i feel like they don't care at all .. they just want to win money and never help us ..
back to S1 this game was really better .. but now even when i play i got afk or troll every game ..

replies.body:
I took a look and it seems our specialist never received the logs they requested or a follow-up from you if you were still having problems. We're definitely here to help you, but you'll need to help us help you by replying to your ticket with those logs so we can investigate into this further. ^.^

If you have any other questions, let me know.

same prob and keys dont work. i lost hope. theres actually more posts like this if you search the whole thread. i stopped playing and just waiting to get back on league if they release new patch. hopefully everything is fixed by then. Riot don't care for mac users cause they think few people use Mac. Not a loss on their part and it sucks.
